office:text.text:p: Long Short Term Memory in MLP Pair
Institute of Information and Communication Technologies - Bulgarian Academy of Sciences
akad. Georgi Bonchev Str., block. 2, office 514, 1113 Sofia, Bulgaria

text:p.text:span: This study focuses on the capabilities to introduce long short-term memory in classical multilayer perceptron. In MLP there are not recurrent links and because of that it has no memory capabilities. The idea of the solution proposed is to improve MLP time series forecasting possibilities by introduction of modified long short-term memory model as pair of artificial neural networks.
artificial neural networks, time series forecasting, back propagation, machine learning
On the base that MLP is the most popular ANN two instances of it can be used as pair in a single network arch
It is possible to use other function instead of the most used activation functions

text:section.text:p: MLP pair shows promising results when it is compared with single MLP in the problem of financial time series forecasting. Training of the MLP pair is more time consuming, but it is logical because the network consists of more neurons and much more connections than the single MLP. The proposed alternatives for activation functions are leading to better distribution of the information in the hidden layers.

text:p.text:span: As further development it will be interesting this kind of training to be implemented as parallel or distributed computing as it is proposed in [3,5].
This work was supported by a private funding of Velbazhd Software LLC.

text:section.text:p: [1] Balabanov, T., Zankinski, I., Barova, M.: Strategy for Individuals Distribution by Incident Nodes Participation in Star Topology of Distributed Evolutionary Algorithms. Cybernetics and Information Technologies, Sofia, Bulgaria, vol. 16, no. 1, 80--88 (2016).

[2] Balabanov, T., Zankinski, I., Dobrinkova, D.: Time Series Prediction by Artificial Neural Networks and Differential Evolution in Distributed Environment. [5] Balabanov, T.: Avoiding Local Optimums in Distributed Population based Heuristic Algorithms (in Bulgarian). Proceedings of XXIII International Symposium Management of energy, industrial and environmental systems, John Atanasoff Union of Automation and Informatics, Sofia, Bulgaria, 83--86 (2015).
[6] Balabanov, T.: Long Short Term Memory in MLP Pair with Encog, https://github.com/VelbazhdSoftwareLLC/Long-Short-Term-Memory-in-MLP-Pair-with-Encog Sofia, Bulgaria (2017).

[7] Keremedchiev, D., Barova, M., Tomov, P.: Mobile application as distributed computing system for artificial neural networks training used in perfect information games, Proceedings of 16th International scientific conference UNITECH16, Gabrovo, Bulgaria, vol. 2, 389--393, (2016).

[8] Tomov, P., Monov, V., Artificial Neural Networks and Differential Evolution Used for Time Series Forecasting in Distributed Environment, Proceedings of International conference Automatics and Informatics, ISSN 1313-1850, 129--132, Sofia, Bulgaria, (2016).

[10] Zankinski, I., Tomov, P., Balabanov, T.: Alternative Activation Function Derivative in Artificial Neural Networks, Proceedings of XXV International Symposium Management of Energy, Industrial and Environmental Systems, ISSN 1313-2237, Bankya, Bulgaria, 79--81, (2017).
